description:
The body of neighborhood nuisance Amagi is found in the park of a high class neighborhood. He was murdered around 9 PM the previous night. The body was stabbed numerous times by an awl-like weapon. Next to the body is the bloodstained medical examination card of neighborhood association president Bando. The police head to Bando`s home to question him... but Bando has been poisoned with a combination of liquor and pesticides, and near the body is a bloodstained awl. Detectives Takagi and Chiba believe that after stabbing Amagi, Bando chose to end his own life, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mystères et rebondissements à Beika (1re partie)
The Shifting Mystery of Beika City (Part 1)
米花町二転三転ミステリー (前編)
